newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech cen bank says received no bids in third repo.
newsitem.headline: Czech cen bank says received no bids in third repo.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) said it received no bids in its one-week repo tender, the third such auction of the day, from May 26 to June 2.

The central bank held two one-week repo tenders earlier on Friday, to May 30 and to June 3, in which average yields reached 74.97 and 73.76 percent resepctively. All bids at the limit 75 percent were accepted in those two tenders.
